description: ACM Observability Dashboard - Prometheus Metrics, Tempo Traces, Loki Logs

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  sum by(stage) (acm_stage_duration_seconds_sum{equipment=~"$equipment"})
  /
  clamp_min(
    sum by(stage) (acm_stage_duration_seconds_count{equipment=~"$equipment"}),
    1
  )
)

title: ACM Observability Dashboard
